oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1948-08-14 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from August 14, 1948. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Singin' A Song Of The Sage (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- Sometime (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Foy Willing and Terry O'Sullivan talk -- I'll Have Somebody Else As Soon As You're Gone (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the Riders Of The Purple Sage -- Cool Water (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the radio play -- Radio play 'Jack The Joker' [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mutual Broadcasting System; All star western theatre (Radio program); O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Sievert, Bud; Vaughn, Jerry; Bates, Jeanne; Pierce, Paul; Grey, Bill
